author: lego12
title: Only ONE minifigure!?!?!
review:
This Advent Calendar is lame and it is from 1999! It is REALLY old and it ,again, has only ONE minifigure! It just has pieces and small ugly little sets! DO NOT get this! Thanks for reading this review and I hope it helped you to decide NOT to get this set! :D

 Lego12
